sense.name: The emotion of the acceptance of despair.
sense.examples: His resignation was complete and he committed suicide. All I can feel is resignation.

sense.name: The act of giving up a claim, office, or possession.
sense.examples: Her resignation was entirely unexpected. His resignation from the team was inconvenient.

sense.name: A formal document giving notice of one's intention to resign.
sense.examples: I'll have my resignation on your desk by morning. She got the resignation in her mailbox.
